description: Government admits 'poor communication' after public anger over the scrapping of the 12 June holiday.
title: Isle of Man bank holiday moved to August following outcry
title_page: Isle of Man bank holiday moved to August following outcry - BBC News
maintext: Bank holidays on the Isle of Man follow the same calendar as England and Wales with two additional dates scheduled solely for Manx workers - on the final day of the TT Races in June and on Tynwald day in July.
